# Ignore build results
bin/
obj/

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates
*.vsidx

# Auto-generated files by Visual Studio
.vscode/
.vs/
.idea/
.DS_Store

# ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

# Packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg

# Log files
*.log

# Backup & temporary files
*~
*.tmp
*.temp
*.bak
*.old
*.orig
*.dll
*.map
.cache

# ASP.NET runtime files
appsettings.Development.json
appsettings.Production.json

# Sensitive files
secret.json
.env
